statements: SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT favorite_color, favorite_game FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_color = 'Blue';
SELECT player_id, avatar_url FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_game = 'Chess';
SELECT favorite_game, favorite_color, player_id FROM player_preferences;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_color = 'Blue';
SELECT player_id, favorite_game FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, favorite_color, favorite_game FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_color = 'Green' AND favorite_game = 'Chess';
SELECT player_id, favorite_color FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_color != 'Red';
SELECT player_id, favorite_color, favorite_game, avatar_url FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences;
SELECT username, email, font_size FROM player_preferences WHERE subscription_level = 1;
SELECT player_id, email, subscription_level FROM player_preferences ORDER BY subscription_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM customization_settings WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT player_id, background_image, currency FROM customization_settings WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE subscription_level > 1 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email, theme_color FROM player_preferences WHERE font_size < 16 AND subscription_level = 3;
SELECT player_id, username, font_size FROM player_preferences WHERE theme_color = 'blue';
SELECT pp.username, cs.display_language FROM player_preferences AS pp INNER JOIN customization_settings AS cs ON pp.player_id = cs.player_id;

SELECT DISTINCT pp.subscription_level, cs.currency FROM player_preferences AS pp INNER JOIN customization_settings AS cs ON pp.player_id = cs.player_id WHERE pp.font_size > 12 AND cs.display_language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM PlayerPreferences;
SELECT display_name, favorite_color FROM PlayerPreferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, music_volume FROM PlayerPreferences ORDER BY music_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameSettings WHERE sound_effects_volume > 50;
SELECT player_id, theme_color, font_style FROM ThemeCustomization WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PlayerPreferences;
SELECT display_name, favorite_color FROM PlayerPreferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT theme_color, font_style, background_image_url FROM ThemeCustomization WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, sound_effects_volume, graphics_quality FROM GameSettings WHERE sound_effects_volume > 50;
SELECT display_name, language FROM PlayerPreferences WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY display_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences;
SELECT player_id, username, email, age FROM player_preferences WHERE country='USA';
SELECT username, email FROM player_preferences WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, email, country FROM player_preferences WHERE theme='dark' AND country='Canada';
SELECT player_id, username, age, country FROM player_preferences WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE age > 18 AND country = 'USA';
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_preferences WHERE country = 'Canada';
SELECT player_id, email, age FROM player_preferences WHERE country <> 'UK' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, theme FROM player_preferences WHERE age < 30 AND theme = 'dark';
SELECT p.player_id, c.setting_id, c.background_color FROM player_preferences p JOIN customization_settings c ON p.player_id = c.player_id WHERE c.font_size > 14 AND c.notifications = true;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, display_name, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT theme_name, theme_color FROM theme_settings WHERE theme_color = 'blue';
SELECT font_name, font_size FROM font_preferences ORDER BY font_size DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_difficulty, high_score FROM game_preferences WHERE high_score > 1000;
SELECT user_id, display_name, email FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM theme_settings WHERE theme_color = 'Blue';
SELECT game_name, game_difficulty, high_score FROM game_preferences WHERE high_score > 1000;
SELECT notification_type, is_enabled FROM notification_settings WHERE is_enabled = true;
SELECT font_name, font_size FROM font_preferences ORDER BY font_size DESC;
